name: combineLatest(_:_:)
desc: cancellable = pub1 .combineLatest(pub2) { (first, second) in return first * second } .sink { print(“Result: ($0).”) }
declaration: func combineLatest<P, T>(_ other: P, _ transform: @escaping (Self.Output, P.Output) -> T) -> Publishers.Map<Publishers.CombineLatest<Self, P>, T> where P : Publisher, Self.Failure == P.Failure
